content: needle instep sts divided on 1 or 2 needles remaining gusset + other half of heel sts on last needle note in working the gusset and foot the entire round is worked in either color a or color b based on which color is used in the ridge check pattern colors are switched just before the beg of the instep sts gusset worked in both colors round 1 k to 3 sts before beg of instep k 2 decrease k 1 work instep sts in pattern k 1 ssk k to end of round round 2 k to beg of instep sts work instep sts in pattern k 1 k 1 tbl k to end of round repeat rnds 1and 2 until there are 16 sts left on each needle 64 sts total foot continue on 64 sts for 2 ins less than the desired length of the foot working instep sts in pattern and sole sts in st st changing colors every 3 rnds as indicated by ridge check pattern cut b yarn toe worked only in color a note half the sts form the sole on 2 ndls and half the sts form the top of the foot on the other 2 ndls toe decreases are worked on both sides of the sole and the top of the foot round 1 k 1 ssk k to 3 sts before the end of the sole k 2 decrease k 1 k 1 ssk k to 3 sts before the end of the round k 2 decrease k 1 round 2 k 1 k 1 tbl k to 3 sts before end of round k 1 tbl k 1 repeat rnds 1 and 2 until half the sts are left 32 sts then repeat round 1 only till 12 sts remain note to keep the ssk s looking more like the k 2 decrease s sl 1 st as if to purl next st as if to knit insert rt ndl as usual into 2 sl sts on left ndl point and k 2 sl sts decrease join sole and top of foot sts decrease using kitchener st or 3 ndl bind off cut yarn and finish off ends copyright june 2001 by jaya srikrishnan all rights reserved the material in this pattern is intended for your personal use only it may be shared with others as long as it remains
